Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Calumet
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Calumet, due to fire department activity near 79th/Calumet.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Calumet, due to fire department activity near 79th/Calumet.

Eastbound #79 79th buses will operate via79th, State, 76th, King Drive, 79th and over regular route.

Westbound #79 79th buses will operate via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Lafayette, 79th and over regular route

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 73rd/Exchange
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted, due to street blockage near 73rd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, 73rd, Yates, 75th, then resume their normal route on Exchange, due to street blockage near 73rd/Exchange.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
